messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Yeah Baby! That's me!
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 10/5/2004 9:32:21 AM Eastern Daylight Time, UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com writes: Or rather spend time with an Earth mama unschooler
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 10/5/2004 9:32:21 AM Eastern Daylight Time,
UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com writes:
Or rather spend time with an
Earth mama unschooler who radiates calm and patience
Come on by if you need me that bad! LOL

Elissa Jill (Earthmomma67)
Life's challenges are not supposed to paralyze you;
They're supposed to help you discover who you are.
~Bernice Johnson Reagon
